pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, March 25, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Maple Ridge, British Columbia

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement to highlight Budget 2019 investments in housing affordability. A media availability will follow.

24108 104th Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.
  • Please note that this event will take place outdoors.
